name: AstroFest
description:
Read the screen for control. The dropdown is to select number of players. Click 6 to return to main menu. Buttons are to turn left, shoot, and turn right in order from top to bottom. Screen can be maximized for better experience.

Powerups:

-Red = Bomb

-Blue = Lazer

-Green = Heal, if full hp then it is shield.\

-Yellow = Triple gun

-Cyan = Scatter shot

-Magenta = Homing missle

Multiplayer fast-paced shooting game, inspired by Astro party.

Future updates include art, turrets, maps, sound effect, and more...
